testcase.name: Test login with various credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the login page.............................................passed When User types username student into the Username field....................passed And User types password Password123 into the Password field.................passed And User clicks the Submit button...........................................passed Then User verifies the message Logged In Successfully is displayed..........passed

testcase.name: Test login with various credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the login page.............................................passed When User types username incorrectUser into the Username field..............passed And User types password Password123 into the Password field.................passed And User clicks the Submit button...........................................passed Then User verifies the message Your username is invalid! is displayed.......passed

testcase.name: Test login with various credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the login page.............................................passed When User types username student into the Username field....................passed And User types password incorrectPassword into the Password field...........passed And User clicks the Submit button...........................................passed Then User verifies the message Your password is invalid! is displayed.......passed
